name: Kiril Morozov
story: Kiril Morozov grew up in a small town in Russia. He was trained in martial arts from a young age and was known for his ruthless fighting style. He joined the Russian military when he was 18 and served for 10 years. After leaving the military, he became a mercenary and joined the Wagner Group. He has been involved in various conflicts around the world and is known for his loyalty to his employers and his brutal tactics.
